Entries.RuneCircle.000: I wouldn't if I were you. There's no telling what effect it may have on the living.$u
Entries.Reading.000: If you don't mind, I'm rather busy at the moment. Perhaps you could come back later.
Entries.Reading.001: A fascinating take on stone tape theory... #$b#Oh, @, it's you. Can I help you?
Entries.Saloon.000: $2I'll never know why Charles insists on coming here, especially during loud nights.#$b#Though I'm happy to tag along if it makes him happy.$h
Entries.Writing.000: I'm afraid that if you don't have helpful information about our current case, I cannot entertain you at the moment. Perhaps try someone else?
